message: Starting analysis of get_agent_output bloat problem. Reading real_mcp_server.py to understand the complete flow.
Read core functions. Now analyzing actual agent log files to identify real-world bloat patterns.
Identified major bloat source: coordination_info in MCP tool responses. Analyzing breakdown.
Analyzing secondary bloat sources: assistant messages, thinking blocks, Read tool results. Building complete picture.
Compiling complete bloat analysis. Found: coordination_info (95% of bloat), assistant messages, Read tool outputs. Building recommendations.

Analysis complete. Identified root causes (coordination_info bloat at source + response bloat), documented bloat breakdown, provided 3 smart truncation strategies. Optimizer has implemented strategies #2 and #3. Strategy #1 (coordination_info structure-aware truncation) is the critical remaining gap.
